hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks to help us solve.

Let's put our tens and ones together.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/08e810350fe313d163561bc0764ed363f19d27f7)

 We have $8\text{ tens}$ and $12\text{ ones}$.

We can put our $12\text{ ones}$ together to make $1\text{ ten}$ and $2\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/190d4530145b69d642c29c2c10d808bedb802346)

In all, there are $9\text{ tens}$ and $2\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1c6af0cd2e08a348ffa07769db2b09922407ec08)

$9\text{ tens} + 2\text{ ones}= 92$

question.content:
**Add.**  
*Hint: Use the place value blocks to help solve $88 + 4$.*

[[☃ numeric-input 2]] $\Large{=88+ 4 }$
